title: Sinks
info: The Sink is a decorative Furniture item that is also a crafting station. It does not fulfill a House's Flat Surface or Comfort item requirement.

stat.table:
Type
FurnitureCrafting station
Placeable (2 wide × 2 high)
Use time10 (Very fast)
Tooltip'Spider-sink, Spider-sink, does whatever a spider can...' (Spider Sink)
Rarity00*
Sell60
